LandingCorporate.title: Revv Tuned
LandingCorporate.subtitle: Since 2018, we have been providing professional chiptuning and performance services in the automotive industry.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: As Revv Tuned, our goal is to maximize our customers' vehicle performance with a quality and reliable service approach.
about.p2: With our expert team and state-of-the-art equipment, we develop tailored solutions for all makes and models. With our customer-oriented approach, we continue to be a reliable partner in the industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the highest quality chiptuning and performance services and ensure our customers get maximum efficiency from their vehicles. To lead the industry with a reliable, transparent and customer-focused approach.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be Turkey's most reliable and preferred automotive performance center. To exceed expectations with continuous improvement and an innovative approach.

timeline.title: Our History
timeline.items: [object Object],[object Object],[object Object],[object Object],[object Object],[object Object]

cta.title: Ready to Work With Us?
cta.description: We are here to increase your vehicle's performance with our professional team and quality service.

LandingOnsite.title: We Are Just One Click Away
LandingOnsite.subtitle: We offer chiptuning service wherever you want with our professional team and mobile service vehicles.

advantages.title: Advantages of On-Site Service
advantages.items: Save time - No need to bring your vehicle,Flexible appointment system - Service at a time that suits you,Safe location - Operation in your own area,Quick intervention - Same day service available,Professional equipment - Fully equipped service vehicle,Under warranty - All operations are guaranteed

cta.title: Make an Appointment Now
cta.description: Our nearest expert team is ready to serve you as soon as possible.
